title: In College-Admissions Case, Lawyers for Coaches, Others Move to Dismiss Charges
text:
BOSTON—Lawyers representing former coaches from prominent college athletic programs filed motions in federal court Tuesday seeking to dismiss the charges against them in the nationwide college-admissions case, arguing the case inappropriately lumped together individuals who weren’t conspiring to commit crimes with one another.

A series of filings said the government cast too wide a net by alleging a vast racketeering conspiracy that includes the coaches, an athletics administrator and alleged lieutenants of admitted scheme...
description: Lawyers representing former coaches from prominent college athletic programs filed motions seeking to dismiss the charges against them in the nationwide college-admissions case, arguing the case inappropriately lumped together individuals who weren’t conspiring to commit crimes with one another.
